Stats

Below are some mildly interesting stats about the blog:

  • 1035 days have passed between the first post and the most recent post.

  • There has been a total of 125 posts.

  • 89 of these are linked, 36 are non-linked.

  • There has been 21 posts on a Monday, 18 on a Tuesday, 14 on a Wednesday, 22 on a Thursday, 25 on a Friday, 17 on a Saturday and 8 on a Sunday.

  • There has been 15 posts in the month of January, 12 in February, 10 in March, 13 in April, 10 in May, 11 in June, 13 in July, 5 in August, 8 in September, 10 in October, 7 in November and 11 in December.

  • 25977 words have been written.

  • The average word count per post is 207.

  • The longest post is “Photo management” with 746 words.
